page.title: 13A Day In The Life Of Claire
page.content: I am ten years old and go to Colerne Primary School. I wake up at 7:15am when I get out of bed. I get washed the cold water dribbling down my face wakes me completely then I get dressed. I have my breakfast and do my piano practice. At 8:00am we are taken to a friends because mum and dad are at work. We play untill 8:55am when we go to school. At school we are doing a Domesday Project which involves lots of trips, my favourite trip is the Daubeneys visit. At 3:15pm school ends, we are picked up and then mum comes to fetch us. Then I have my tea. At 5:00pm I go for my violin lesson, I like it although it does not always make a nice noise. Next I go to Guides. At 8:00pm I fall exhausted into bed.
